solution_line_template: He did {races_per_type} races in the lake because {total_races} / 2 = <<{total_races}/2={races_per_type}>>{races_per_type}
He did {races_per_type} races in the ocean because {total_races} / 2 = <<{total_races}/2={races_per_type}>>{races_per_type}
He raced {lake_races_miles} miles in the lake because {races_per_type} x {miles_per_race} = <<{races_per_type}*{miles_per_race}={lake_races_miles}>>{lake_races_miles}
His lake races took {lake_time} hours because {lake_races_miles} / {lake_speed} = <<{lake_races_miles}/{lake_speed}={lake_time}>>{lake_time}
He raced {ocean_races_miles} miles in the ocean because {races_per_type} x {miles_per_race} = <<{races_per_type}*{miles_per_race}={ocean_races_miles}>>{ocean_races_miles}
His ocean races took {ocean_time} hours because {ocean_races_miles} / {ocean_speed} = <<{ocean_races_miles}/{ocean_speed}={ocean_time}>>{ocean_time}
